sentences.sContent: We all like the tranquility of the country life.
sentences.sContent_eng: We all like the tranquility of the country life.
sentences.sCn: 我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。

sentences.sContent: For this brings not only the tranquility which comes from doing well, but also that which comes from doing few things.
sentences.sContent_eng: For this brings not only the tranquility which comes from doing well, but also that which comes from doing few things.
sentences.sCn: 因为这不仅带来由于做事适当而产生的宁静，而且带来由于做很少的事而产生的宁静。

sentences.sContent: And while I love my family to death, this time of tranquility is one of absolute bliss for me.
sentences.sContent_eng: And while I love my family to death, this time of tranquility is one of absolute bliss for me.
sentences.sCn: 虽然我对我的家庭爱得要死，但这片刻的宁静绝对是我的幸福之一。

remMethod.val: 来自tranquil(adj. 宁静的， 安静的)

words.tran: 安静的，平静的；安宁的；稳定的
